tasks.title: üî¥ CRITICAL: Replace Base64 with AES-256-GCM for API keys
tasks.description: API keys use Base64 encoding (NOT encryption). All stored keys can be trivially decoded. Use proper AES-256-GCM from vault-crypto.ts.
tasks.summary: ‚úÖ ALREADY FIXED in PR #177 (commit e76a114). AES-256-GCM with PBKDF2 100k iterations.

tasks.title: üî¥ CRITICAL: Remove unsafe-eval and unsafe-inline from CSP
tasks.description: CSP includes unsafe-eval and unsafe-inline which defeats the entire purpose of CSP. Enables XSS attacks.
tasks.summary: ‚úÖ ALREADY FIXED in PR #177. CSP hardened in proxy.ts.

tasks.title: üî¥ CRITICAL: Add Zod schema validation to all API routes
tasks.description: API routes lack proper input validation. Risk of parameter injection, DoS via malformed inputs.
tasks.summary: ‚úÖ FIXED in PR #177. 30+ Zod schemas, 18 routes updated with type-safe validation.

tasks.title: üü† HIGH: Implement API rate limiting
tasks.description: No rate limiting on API endpoints. DDoS vulnerability, brute force attacks possible.

tasks.title: üü† HIGH: Reduce session token expiry from 7d to 24h
tasks.description: Session tokens expire after 7 days - extended hijacking window. Reduce to 24 hours.
tasks.summary: ‚úÖ FIXED in PR #177. Session expiry reduced to 24h with hourly refresh.

tasks.title: üü† HIGH: Add file signature validation for uploads
tasks.description: File uploads only check MIME type (spoofable). Add magic byte validation.
tasks.summary: üîÑ IN REVIEW - PR #216: Magic byte validation for JPEG/PNG/GIF/WebP. PR #221 also adds audio magic byte validation. Validates file content, not just MIME type.

tasks.title: Chat Ambiance: Custom backgrounds & ambient audio for bot cards
tasks.description: Add custom background images and ambient audio for Lounge characters. Supports character-level defaults AND per-intro overrides in V2 spec multi-intro cards. Includes magic byte file validation for images + audio.
tasks.summary: üîÑ IN REVIEW - PR #221: Background images (15% opacity overlay) + ambient audio with controls. Per-intro overrides. Magic byte validation for JPEG/PNG/GIF/WebP/MP3/WAV/OGG/FLAC/M4A. +1,077 lines across 7 files.

tasks.title: Header bar missing after navigating back from chat
tasks.description: Header bar disappears after navigating back from a chat in the Lounge.

tasks.description: Add Lovense hardware integration support for bot interactions in Lounge.

tasks.description: Integrate NovelAI as an image generation provider in Atelier.

tasks.title: Atelier: TensorArt provider integration
tasks.description: Integrate TensorArt as an image generation provider in Atelier.

tasks.title: Atelier: TensorHub provider integration
tasks.description: Integrate TensorHub as an image generation provider in Atelier.

tasks.title: Bug: Atelier profiles share data instead of saving per-profile
tasks.description: Atelier profiles share data instead of isolating state per profile. Related to GH-188.

tasks.title: Feature: Save all new Atelier parameters to Vault
tasks.description: Persist all new Atelier generation parameters to the encrypted Vault storage.

tasks.title: Feature: Integrate other products flow into Atelier
tasks.description: Add integration flow for other product types within the Atelier workflow.

tasks.title: Feature: Image reference support (ViT/IP-Adapter style)
tasks.description: Add image reference / style transfer support using ViT or IP-Adapter approaches in Atelier.

tasks.title: Bug: Resolution manual input locked to fixed increments
tasks.description: Resolution manual input is locked to fixed increments and can't use in-between values in Atelier.

tasks.title: üü† HIGH: Remove console.log, implement structured logging
tasks.description: 180+ console.log statements in production, some expose credentials. Use pino or winston.

tasks.title: üü† HIGH: Add CORS configuration
tasks.description: Missing CORS configuration allows cross-origin exploitation. Restrict to production domain.
tasks.summary: ‚úÖ FIXED in PR #177. CORS middleware restricts origins to production domains.

tasks.title: üü† HIGH: Add request size limits
tasks.description: No request size limits. DoS via large uploads, memory exhaustion possible.
tasks.summary: ‚úÖ FIXED in PR #177. Added 4MB body size limit in next.config.js.

tasks.title: üü† HIGH: Prevent user enumeration in error messages
tasks.description: Error messages reveal if email exists. Use generic 'Invalid credentials' message.
tasks.summary: ‚úÖ FIXED in PR #177. Standardized error messages to prevent enumeration.

tasks.title: üü† HIGH: Consolidate duplicate admin verification logic
tasks.description: Admin verification duplicated across files. Extract to shared middleware, implement RBAC.
tasks.summary: ‚úÖ FIXED in PR #177. Created shared requireCeoAuth utility, refactored 6 admin routes. -53 lines net.

tasks.title: üü° Audit all admin routes for auth protection
tasks.description: Security audit: ensure all admin routes have proper authentication checks.

tasks.title: üî¥ Add admin auth protection to /moderation page
tasks.description: HIGH priority: /moderation page needs admin authentication protection.

tasks.title: Add ADetailer installation guide in Atelier
tasks.description: Add installation guide and download links for ADetailer extension in Atelier settings.

tasks.title: Add tag autocompletion using Danbooru dataset
tasks.description: Implement tag suggestions and autocompletion in prompt input using Danbooru tag dataset. PR #194 submitted with full implementation.
tasks.summary: üîÑ IN REVIEW - PR #194: Danbooru tag autocomplete with 25K tags, category colors, fuzzy search, PWA-styled dropdown. Awaiting merge.

tasks.title: Atelier profiles sharing cached data
tasks.description: Bug: Atelier profiles are sharing cached data instead of isolating state per profile.

tasks.title: Avatar upload fails with R2 credentials error
tasks.description: Avatar upload showing 'R2 credentials not configured' error in Manifest.

tasks.title: üü° Voice Chatting with AI
tasks.description: Add voice chat capability for AI conversations in Lounge.

tasks.title: Security Audit: Critical Vulnerabilities (Score: 4.2/10)
tasks.description: Comprehensive security audit identified 43 issues. PR #177 includes: Hardcoded CEO email removed (env var required), SSRF protection on ComfyUI proxy (port whitelist), dev PIN moved to env var, CivitAI improvements, and 10x faster downloads.
tasks.summary: üîÑ IN REVIEW - PR #177: 11 security fixes! ‚úÖ AES-256-GCM, ‚úÖ CSP hardened, ‚úÖ Zod validation, ‚úÖ CORS, ‚úÖ 24h session, ‚úÖ Request limits, ‚úÖ User enumeration, ‚úÖ Admin auth consolidated. Est. score: 7.5/10

tasks.title: CivitAI Browser downloads to wrong folder
tasks.description: Downloads from CivitAI Browser don't go to manually set folder. Fixed with smart dual-mode download system + auto-detect paths feature.
tasks.summary: ‚úÖ FIX IMPLEMENTED - PR #177: Smart download method (fast ~50MB/s when paths configured, standard ~5MB/s fallback). Added Auto-Detect paths button. Awaiting merge.

tasks.summary: ‚úÖ FIX IMPLEMENTED - PR #177: Server-side downloads (~50 MB/s) + Auto-Detect paths button for easy setup. Awaiting merge.
